**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! **🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring

**🚀 Building a Medical Research Assistant with LlamaIndex | Seeking Entry-Level Generative AI Roles** I’m excited to share my latest project: a **Medical Research Assistant** powered by **LlamaIndex**, designed to analyze medical papers and answer complex queries. This project combines **hybrid search** (vector + keyword) with **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to deliver accurate, evidence-based answers. 🩺✨ As a **Generative AI Engineer**, I’m actively seeking **entry-level opportunities** to apply my skills in **AI/ML, NLP, and RAG systems**. If you’re hiring or know someone who is, let’s connect! 🤝 ---### **Key Features** 🔑 - **Hybrid Search**: Merges semantic understanding (Hugging Face embeddings) and keyword matching (BM25) for precise document retrieval. 🔍 - **RAG Pipeline**: Integrates **Groq’s Llama-3.1-8b-instant** model to generate concise, context-aware answers. 🤖 - **Persistent Storage**: Saves indexed documents for quick reloads and scalability. 💾 - **Query Caching**: Optimizes performance for frequently asked questions. ⚡ ---### **Why It Matters** 💡 This project demonstrates my ability to: 1. **Process raw data**: PDF text extraction, cleaning, and JSON storage. 🧹 2. **Implement production-grade AI systems**: Using LlamaIndex for hybrid search and RAG. 🛠️ 3. **Balance accuracy and efficiency**: In retrieval pipelines. ⚖️ ---### **Tech Stack** 🛠️ - **LlamaIndex**: Document indexing, hybrid search. 📚 - **Groq**: Lightning-fast LLM inference. ⚡ - **Hugging Face**: State-of-the-art embeddings. 🤗 - **PyPDF2 + Python**: Data preprocessing magic. 🐍 ---### **Repo Links** 🔗 - [LlamaIndex Projects](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) - [Medical Research Assistant](https://lnkd.in/dmQKZhVR) ---### **Open to Opportunities!** 🌟 I’m actively looking for **entry-level roles** in: - **Generative AI Engineering** - **NLP/RAG Systems** - **AI/ML Development** If you’re hiring or know someone who is, I’d love to connect! Let’s build the future of AI together. 🚀 ---### **Let’s Connect!** 🤝 Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just to chat about AI! hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#EntryLevelAI hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#NLP hashtag#RAG hashtag#LlamaIndex hashtag#DataEngineering hashtag#OpenToWork ---

Saturday to read about the role of the human assessor (or human oversight) in the ADM process, how to make human decisions, how to implement the human oversight process and how to ensure accountability, to comply with Article 22 GDPR from the Dutch DPA's consultation on meaningful human intervention! See https://lnkd.in/dXMPJY-NAccountability in the decision-making processHow does the organization maintain ultimate responsibility? It is crucial for an organization to retain responsibility for the use of an algorithm. Human intervention ensures that the outcome of an algorithm does not lead to a decision that is based solely on automated processing. This responsibility should not lie with the assessor alone. Various researchers studying automated decision-making have warned against this."Componentes: 1. Leadership and oversight2. Policies and procedures3. Training3.1. All relevant factors3.2. Human discretion3.3. Competence3.4. Technology and design3.5. Process 4. Testing and monitoring
